FuncDef: This command configures the mode used to send Fib population packets. When SRRP becomes master it generates gratuitous ARPs (GARPs) used by the Layer 2 access network to populate the correct SRRP gateway.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies on which VLANs the gratuitous ARPs are sent. Values-all: Generates, on SSRP master assignment, the GARPs on all VLANs.
